description.zh-cn: 中国军事家，北伐名将，中国人民解放军创始人之一。曾任新四军军长，在皖南事变中被俘，获释后因空难去世。
description.en: Chinese military strategist, a famous general of the Northern Expedition, and one of the founders of the Chinese People's Liberation Army. He served as the commander of the New Fourth Army, was captured in the Wannan Incident, and died in a plane crash after his release.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺的妻子，与叶挺及部分子女在四八空难中一同遇难。
description.en: Wife of Ye Ting, who died with him and some of their children in the April 8th air crash.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺长子，曾任国防科工委副主任，中国人民解放军中将。
description.en: Eldest son of Ye Ting, former deputy director of the Commission for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense, and a lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺的父亲。
description.en: Father of Ye Ting.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Ye Ting.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺的弟弟。
description.en: Younger brother of Ye Ting.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代史上第一所正规陆军军校，叶挺曾于此就读。
description.en: The first formal military academy in modern Chinese history, where Ye Ting studied.

zh-cn: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 全称国民革命军陆军新编第四军，是中国共产党领导的抗日武装力量之一，叶挺为首任军长。
description.en: Officially named the New Fourth Army of the National Revolutionary Army, it was one of the anti-Japanese armed forces led by the Communist Party of China, with Ye Ting as its first commander.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党针对中国国民党的分共政策而发起的武装起义，由叶挺、周恩来、贺龙、朱德、刘伯承等领导。
description.en: An armed uprising launched by the Communist Party of China in response to the Kuomintang's anti-communist policies, led by figures including Ye Ting, Zhou Enlai, He Long, Zhu De, and Liu Bocheng.

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党领导的针对国民党的武装起义，叶挺担任工农红军总司令。
description.en: An armed uprising against the Kuomintang led by the Communist Party of China, with Ye Ting serving as the commander-in-chief of the Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，国民革命军第三战区部队在安徽省泾县对新四军军部所辖部队的军事打击事件，导致新四军损失惨重，军长叶挺被俘。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, an attack by the National Revolutionary Army's Third War Area on the headquarters of the New Fourth Army in Jing County, Anhui Province, resulted in heavy losses for the New Fourth Army and the capture of its commander, Ye Ting.

description.zh-cn: 1946年4月8日，一架C-46运输机在山西兴县黑茶山地区失事，机上中共代表王若飞、博古、邓发及刚获释的叶挺等人全部遇难。
description.en: On April 8, 1946, a C-46 transport plane crashed in the Heicha Mountain area of Xing County, Shanxi, killing all on board, including CCP representatives Wang Ruofei, Bo Gu, Deng Fa, and the newly released Ye Ting.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在1925年至1948年间的中央政府与最高行政机关。
description.en: The central government and highest administrative body of the Republic of China from 1925 to 1948.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺与李秀文于1925年结婚。
description.en: Ye Ting and Li Xiuwen married in 1925.

description.zh-cn: 叶锡三是叶挺的父亲。
description.en: Ye Xisan was Ye Ting's father.

description.zh-cn: 吴氏是叶挺的母亲。
description.en: Mother Wu was Ye Ting's mother.

description.zh-cn: 叶辅平是叶挺的弟弟。
description.en: Ye Fuping was Ye Ting's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 叶正大是叶挺的长子。
description.en: Ye Zhengda was Ye Ting's eldest son.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺于1918年从保定陆军军官学校毕业。
description.en: Ye Ting graduated from the Baoding Military Academy in 1918.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺于1924年加入中国共产党，1928年脱党。1946年获释后重新入党。
description.en: Ye Ting joined the Communist Party of China in 1924 and left the party in 1928. He rejoined the party after his release in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 国民政府于1937年9月28日任命叶挺为新四军军长，该职务因其在1941年皖南事变中被俘而终止。
description.en: The Nationalist Government appointed Ye Ting as the commander of the New Fourth Army on September 28, 1937. His tenure ended when he was captured in the Wannan Incident in 1941.

description.zh-cn: 1919年，叶挺追随孙中山革命，在其麾下任职，包括建国陆海军大元帅府警卫团营长。
description.en: In 1919, Ye Ting followed Sun Yat-sen's revolution and served under his command, including as a battalion commander in the Guards Regiment of the Generalissimo's Headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 1922年6月，陈炯明部队炮轰总统府，叶挺奉命守卫并掩护孙夫人宋庆龄脱险。
description.en: In June 1922, when Chen Jiongming's troops shelled the Presidential Palace, Ye Ting was ordered to guard the premises and cover the escape of Madame Sun Yat-sen, Soong Ching-ling.

description.zh-cn: 1922年，粤军总司令陈炯明的部队炮轰总统府，叶挺率部抵抗。
description.en: In 1922, troops under Guangdong Army Commander-in-Chief Chen Jiongming shelled the Presidential Palace, and Ye Ting led his forces to resist.

description.zh-cn: 1924年12月，经王若飞和王一飞介绍，叶挺被中共旅莫支部接受为候补党员。
description.en: In December 1924, through the introduction of Wang Ruofei and Wang Yifei, Ye Ting was accepted as a probationary member of the CCP by its Moscow branch.

description.zh-cn: 1924年12月，经王若飞和王一飞介绍，叶挺被中共旅莫支部接受为候补党员。
description.en: In December 1924, through the introduction of Wang Ruofei and Wang Yifei, Ye Ting was accepted as a probationary member of the CCP by its Moscow branch.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺是南昌起义的主要领导人之一，担任代理前敌总指挥兼第十一军军长。
description.en: Ye Ting was one of the main leaders of the Nanchang Uprising, serving as the acting front-line commander-in-chief and commander of the Eleventh Army.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺领导了广州起义，并出任工农红军总司令。
description.en: Ye Ting led the Guangzhou Uprising and served as the commander-in-chief of the Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 张发奎调集军队反攻，于12月13日夺回广州，导致起义失败。
description.en: Zhang Fakui mobilized his troops to counter-attack and recaptured Guangzhou on December 13, leading to the failure of the uprising.

description.zh-cn: 1937年9月28日，国民政府军事委员会任命叶挺为新四军军长。
description.en: On September 28, 1937, the Military Affairs Commission of the Nationalist Government appointed Ye Ting as the commander of the New Fourth Army.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺与新四军政委项英在一系列战略问题上产生分歧，关系紧张，叶挺一度因此离军出走。
description.en: Ye Ting had disagreements with New Fourth Army political commissar Xiang Ying on a series of strategic issues, leading to a strained relationship that once caused Ye Ting to leave his post.

description.zh-cn: 1939年5月，叶挺下令处决了新四军第四支队司令员高敬亭。
description.en: In May 1939, Ye Ting ordered the execution of Gao Jingting, commander of the Fourth Detachment of the New Fourth Army.

description.zh-cn: 在皖南事变中，叶挺所率新四军军部及直属部队大部被歼，叶挺本人于谈判时被扣押，开始了长达五年的囚禁生涯。
description.en: During the Wannan Incident, the headquarters and direct subordinate units of the New Fourth Army led by Ye Ting were mostly annihilated. Ye Ting himself was detained during negotiations, beginning a five-year period of imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 皖南事变中，叶挺下山与国民党军谈判时被第32集团军总司令上官云相扣押。
description.en: During the Wannan Incident, while going down the mountain to negotiate with the KMT forces, Ye Ting was detained by Shangguan Yunxiang, the commander of the 32nd Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 蒋介石命令第三战区部队向新四军发起总攻，并强令“彻底加以肃清”，直接导致了皖南事变的爆发。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek ordered the troops of the Third War Area to launch a general offensive against the New Fourth Army with the order to "thoroughly eliminate" them, which directly led to the Wannan Incident.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺乘坐的飞机在山西兴县黑茶山失事，导致其遇难身亡。
description.en: The plane carrying Ye Ting crashed in Heicha Mountain, Xing County, Shanxi, resulting in his death.

description.zh-cn: 王若飞与叶挺等人同机，在山西兴县黑茶山空难中遇难。
description.en: Wang Ruofei was on the same plane as Ye Ting and others, and died in the Heicha Mountain air crash in Xing County, Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来多次与叶挺会面和沟通，在叶挺出任新四军军长、处理与项英的矛盾以及两次离职后劝其归队等关键时刻起到了重要作用。
description.en: Zhou Enlai met and communicated with Ye Ting on multiple occasions, playing a crucial role at key moments such as Ye Ting's appointment as commander of the New Fourth Army, handling his conflicts with Xiang Ying, and persuading him to return to his post after he resigned twice.

description.zh-cn: 1937年11月，毛泽东邀请叶挺访问延安，打消了中共方面对其脱党的顾虑，并称赞他是“共产党的第一任总司令，人民军队的战史要从你写起”。
description.en: In November 1937, Mao Zedong invited Ye Ting to visit Yan'an, dispelling the CCP's concerns about his previous departure from the party, and praised him as 'the first commander-in-chief of the Communist Party, and the military history of the people's army should start with you.'

description.zh-cn: 北伐战争期间，叶挺所在的国民革命军第四军军长为张发奎，叶挺受其指挥。
description.en: During the Northern Expedition, the commander of the Fourth Army of the National Revolutionary Army, where Ye Ting served, was Zhang Fakui, and Ye Ting was under his command.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺与周恩来在南昌起义、广州起义等事件中共同领导，并在叶挺流亡和统率新四军期间多次会面。
description.en: Ye Ting and Zhou Enlai co-led events such as the Nanchang and Guangzhou Uprisings, and met multiple times during Ye Ting's exile and his command of the New Fourth Army.
